评论详情: Nice fabric and I love the print as well as the quality, however it's a bit more transparent than I'd like. I'll have to wear a body suit under it.
Bought this top along with a skirt for a concert. Medium fits perfect, I’m about 130 lbs and 5’5. Love how the outfit came together!
Such a cute too! I got a medium because I’m a little busty but def could have gotten a small! This is so adorable and perfect for nights out!
Fits perfectly

This product is super cute, but the color (apricot)  is way more yellow then shown in the picture. I returned it and got it in white instead. The fit was really good, but it had some loose threads when it arrived.

I wore this for a concert and had no problems throughout the night! It's very nice for the price, and the quality is good. The main body of the top is thick and not see-through, so you don't have to worry about adding another shirt under. It's a bit scratchy on arrival, but became soft once I put it through the wash. Very stretchy and fit my fuller bust nicely. Overall great purchase

This looks as pictured except it’s so cropped. I’m 5’7 about 150 lbs. it fits how I want it everywhere but the length is just about an inch and a half below my bust line. Even with high waisted pants you see a LOT of my upper stomach. There’s a time and place for it, but it’s not an everyday wear because of that. I probably could have gotten an XL and it would have fit still everywhere but the length still would have probably been shorter than I expected.

My god, I can’t explain how adorable this top is. Made me feel like a fairy, so pretty. 🥹🩷 It’s also so nice and the texture of the fabric is really nice feeling, and is super soft and a lil stretchy. 11/10!

评论概述: SO COMFY AND PRETTY! I LOVE IT!

评论详情: I washed this top the moment it came in the mail because it smelled very strongly of perfume and chemicals, Otherwise, it's a very cute top and very flattering.
Omg gorgeous in person. Size small fit perfect. I am 5’7” 115 lbs.

This shirt is very high quality. Not see through. So elegant and HOT! Being not even 1 year post partum and gaining far more weight than I expected to, I was having such issues feeling pretty in anything. This shirt changed that for me! Buying the other colors. - P.S I am the wife on the account I’m posting from lol
This shirt is so cute and flattering. It is a bit cropped so if you’re between sizes I would size up! Material is lightweight! Perfect as a transitional summer to fall shirt!

i got this to make my own costume and it was a fail! (just this part was, i got a different shirt for the fit lol) Anyways, it’s see through & ver small, as in cropped small, and the material is scratchy and it feels like cheap lace. Not a fan maybe cute if i got 2 sizes up and it fit like a normal shirt.
I bought this for a cast member in a production of "I Hate Hamlet" and she looked beautiful in it.  I was very pleased with the price and how she looked on stage wearing it.
Wore this to a sabrina carpenter concert with a mini skirt and it turned out so cute

Modest enough, but 'edgy'. Ordered four items for my 13 yo daughter, and the reviews are the same. Fun for parties, but not school clothes. Items ordered were:  SOLY HUX mesh crop top; TSMNZMU ‘Goth’ skirt; CELNEPHO knee-high black platform boots; and some generic black leggings.
Super freaking cute top! Love the V cut in the front! Very comfy and has some stretch and super flattering with the wide sleeves

I’m so in love with this blouse. The casual flowing style looks like something you’d wear to a festival, but it’s still dressy enough to wear to a lunch or dinner date. The fabric is heavier and stretchier than I expected, which is a good thing, but it still has an airy and soft feel to it. It goes great with jeans, leggings, or even shorts. Love it!

This top was very cute and pretty true to size (maybe runs a tad small for US sizes) but is a lot more cropped than I was expecting. Had to return as that wasn't the look I was going for — also, the ties for the bow are very long
I'm 5’7 and 155. I’m a D cup and got the L and it fit perfectly!
This felt super comfortable and I love how flowey it is! It looks so good with a white-ish bra and feels so nice!

Material is soft, a little thin so this is definitely an early fall shirt and not a winter shirt. It looks just like the picture! The sleeves are a good length and the fit is perfect. Overall, very flattering!
I knew this was a crop top, but it’s quite a bit more cropped and sheer than it appears. Mine barely comes below my bra. Still cute, but not practical. The sleeves are fun
Got this top for a hippie costume, honestly super comfy and cute, would not want to try putting this in the wash though, I suspect it would not be in great condition after
